description:
Learn the most effective way to create compelling online content. ScreenCasting is the ideal media for fast and effective content creation. Learn to ScreenCast from the MasterCaster himself!

Master ScreenCasting in this comprehensive course.

A unique mixture of 4 Recorded Lessons with Q&A, 8 Training Modules Plus Bonuses will prepare you to tackle ScreenCasting with the skills to create great content, and the vision to make it special!

Because Udemy will not allow you to stream live each week I will post the recording from the live lesson in this udemy course. but if you would like to join us the link will be pushed out 1 hour before each live lesson.

4 Recorded Live LessonsAll "Live" events are recorded and will be available on demand after recordingLive Lesson 1ScreenCasting Performance

Justin shares over 9 years of performance tips and techniques!

Live Lesson 2Formats and Branding

How best to serve your brand, your audience and your content.

Live Lesson 3Publishing and Promotion

Build a community with your videos, How to Publish and Promote to reach YOUR engaged audience..

Live Lesson 4Interactive Q & A

Our final Live Broadcast includes your questions, Live and Interactive.
title: Screencasting Made Easy
